name: Road Run And Gun Fun
description:
Super fun and challenging driving and shooting game. Drive the car by tilting the device left or right to move the car and touch the screen to shoot. Collect the gas containers to refill your tank. The larger the gas container the more it refills. When you hit a car or road cone you get damaged but if you get the wrench power-up you can repair some of the damage. The more damage you have the less movability you have. Avoid or shoot the cars and bombs. How far can you drive?

+ Shoot other cars and bombs
+ Gas containers refill your gas tank
+ Wrench power-up repairs damage
+ Hitting cars and road cones give you damage
+ Tilt and touch controls
+ Fun For All Ages
+ Leaderboard
